io.atomix.catalyst.buffer

Class NativeBytes

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.catalyst.buffer.AbstractBytes
      • io.atomix.catalyst.buffer.NativeBytes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bytes, BytesInput<Bytes>, BytesOutput<Bytes>, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectBytes, MappedBytes

    public abstract class NativeBytes
extends AbstractBytes
    Native bytes.

    Bytes are read from and written to the JVM's underlying static Unsafe instance. Bytes are read in ByteOrder.nativeOrder() order and if necessary bytes are reversed to ByteOrder.BIG_ENDIAN order.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface io.atomix.catalyst.buffer.Bytes

      • resize

        public Bytes resize(long newSize)
        Description copied from interface: Bytes
        Resizes the bytes.

        When the bytes are resized, underlying memory addresses in copies of this instance may no longer be valid. Additionally, if the newSize is smaller than the current count then some data may be lost during the resize. Use with caution.

        Parameters:
        newSize - The count to which to resize this instance.
        Returns:
        The resized bytes.
